name: Hamsta's Paradise (Cedric86)
description:
The game

You are a hamster trapped in your running wheel…

Your goal: Collect all carrots and escape captivity!

Project info

This was a project we made for LudumDare 47, a Gamejam held in October of last year. Developement time was 3 days. Theme: "Escape the loop".

We reached 660th place in overall ratings out of 3206 submissions.

Controls
  • W A S D keys to steer
  • R to reset the level
Credits Code / Art / Design:

Cedric Brupbacher

Benjamin Bachmann

SFX & Music

David Brupbacher

Tools used
  • Unity
  • Rider
  • Blender
  • Gimp
  • Substance Painter
  • Ableton Live

Enjoy :-)
